message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront since the clock is ticking on my share.
Your share loses value each round, Alice.  Let's be realistic and split a little closer this time.
I understand the situation, Bob, but I'm still losing value.  Let's meet in the middle.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  This is a very reasonable offer considering the circumstances.
This is my final attempt at a fair deal, Bob.  Any lower and the inflation makes it pointless for me to agree.
